comments.body:
Asked upstream to package the license file in the future so we can just use it directly

xref: https://github.com/bhargavchippada/forceatlas2/issues/30

diffHunk:

  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://pypi.org/project/fa2/
  dev_url: https://github.com/bhargavchippada/forceatlas2
